gobblin.runtime

Class GobblinMultiTaskAttempt

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.GobblinMultiTaskAttempt

  • @Alpha
public class GobblinMultiTaskAttempt
extends Object
    Attempt of running multiple Tasks generated from a list ofWorkUnits. A GobblinMultiTaskAttempt is usually a unit of workunits that are assigned to one container.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GobblinMultiTaskAttempt.CommitPolicy
      An enumeration of policies on when a GobblinMultiTaskAttempt will be committed.

        public void commit()
            throws IOException
        Commit tasks by 1. calling Task.commit() in parallel; 2. executing any additional CommitStep; 3. persist task statestore.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • runWorkUnits

        public static GobblinMultiTaskAttempt runWorkUnits(JobContext jobContext,
                                                   Iterator<WorkUnit> workUnits,
                                                   TaskStateTracker taskStateTracker,
                                                   TaskExecutor taskExecutor,
                                                   GobblinMultiTaskAttempt.CommitPolicy multiTaskAttemptCommitPolicy)
                                            throws IOException,
                                                   InterruptedException
        FIXME this method is provided for backwards compatibility in the LocalJobLauncher since it does not access the task state store. This should be addressed as all task executions should be updating the task state.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • runWorkUnits

        public static GobblinMultiTaskAttempt runWorkUnits(String jobId,
                                                   String containerId,
                                                   JobState jobState,
                                                   List<WorkUnit> workUnits,
                                                   TaskStateTracker taskStateTracker,
                                                   TaskExecutor taskExecutor,
                                                   StateStore<TaskState> taskStateStore,
                                                   GobblinMultiTaskAttempt.CommitPolicy multiTaskAttemptCommitPolicy,
                                                   SharedResourcesBroker<GobblinScopeTypes> jobBroker)
                                            throws IOException,
                                                   InterruptedException
        Run a given list of WorkUnits of a job.

        This method creates GobblinMultiTaskAttempt to actually run the Tasks of the WorkUnits, and optionally commit.

        Parameters:
        jobId - the job ID
        workUnits - the given list of WorkUnits to submit to run
        taskStateTracker - a TaskStateTracker for task state tracking
        taskExecutor - a TaskExecutor for task execution
        taskStateStore - a StateStore for storing TaskStates
        multiTaskAttemptCommitPolicy - GobblinMultiTaskAttempt.CommitPolicy for committing GobblinMultiTaskAttempt
        Throws:
        IOException - if there's something wrong with any IO operations
        InterruptedException - if the task execution gets cancelled
